Class CompanyRep

java.lang.Object
team5.User
team5.CompanyRep
public class CompanyRep extends User
Represents a company representative user in the internship placement management system. This class extends User and includes company-specific attributes such as company name, department, position, and account status. Company representatives can create internship opportunities (up to 5), review student applications, and manage their postings. Account must be approved by Career Center Staff before login is allowed.

  • Field Details

    • MAX_INTERNSHIPS_PER_REP

      public static final int MAX_INTERNSHIPS_PER_REP
      Maximum number of internships a company representative can create
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • CompanyRep

      public CompanyRep(String userID, String name, String email, String password, String companyName, String department, String position, UserAccountStatus status, ArrayList<Internship> createdInternships)
      Constructs a new CompanyRep with the specified details. The user type is automatically set to COMREP. Account status determines whether the representative can log in to the system.
      Parameters:
      userID - the unique identifier for the company representative (company email)
      name - the full name of the representative
      email - the email address of the representative
      password - the password for the representative account
      companyName - the name of the company the representative works for
      department - the department within the company
      position - the job position of the representative
      status - the account approval status (PENDING, APPROVED, or REJECTED)
      createdInternships - the list of internships created by this representative

    • getAccountStatus

      public UserAccountStatus getAccountStatus()

    • addInternship

      public boolean addInternship(Internship internship)
      Adds a new internship to the list of internships created by this representative. Checks if the maximum number of internships (5) has been reached before adding.
      Parameters:
      internship - the internship to be added
      Returns:
      true if the internship is successfully added, false if the maximum limit is reached

    • isMaxInternshipReached

      public boolean isMaxInternshipReached()
      Checks whether the company representative has reached the maximum number of internships. The maximum allowed is defined by MAX_INTERNSHIPS_PER_REP constant.
      Returns:
      true if the maximum number of internships has been reached, false otherwise

    • getInternships

      public ArrayList<Internship> getInternships()

    • updateInternship

      public boolean updateInternship(Internship internship)
      Updates an existing internship with new details. Searches for the internship by ID and updates all editable fields.
      Parameters:
      internship - the internship object containing updated information
      Returns:
      true if the internship is found and updated, false otherwise

    • removeInternship

      public boolean removeInternship(Internship internship)
      Removes an internship from the list of created internships. Searches for the internship by ID and removes it from the list.
      Parameters:
      internship - the internship to be removed
      Returns:
      true if the internship is found and removed, false otherwise

      public void viewInternshipApproval()
